title: Why the fuck would u put so much pressure at bot lane?
body:
Now, i don't even care about any other changes ,for i can fit in with them, but This?

DRAGONSLAYER BUFF:

        Stack 1: Increased Regeneration

        Stack 2: Increased AD / AP

        Stack 3: Increased Movement Speed

        Stack 4: Increased Health

        Stack 5: Triples all other bonuses


Are you kidding me?


http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LJ6kSYL8HrQ/VDdkrhf-_II/AAAAAAAAa1A/7ag9D7XPj2M/s1600/dragg.jpg
